hillbillies.model.unit

Class AttackActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • hillbillies.model.unit.Activity
      • hillbillies.model.unit.AttackActivity

  • class AttackActivity
extends Activity
    The activity for attacking another unit.

    • Method Detail

      • setTarget

        void setTarget(Unit other)
        throws InvalidUnitException
        Initialises the attack activity with the given attacker and defender.
        Parameters:
        other - The unit that is attacked.
        Effects:
      • The unit's will face each other.
            this.getUnit().lookAt(other.getPosition()) &&
            other.lookAt(this.getUnit().getPosition())
      • The defender will defend against the attack
            other.defend(this.getUnit())
        • Throws:
        InvalidUnitException - The other unit is invalid. | other == null || other == this.getUnit() || other.isFalling() || !other.isAlive()
        InvalidUnitException - The other unit is too far away to attack. | !this.canAttack(other)
        InvalidUnitException - The other unit is of the same faction. | this.getUnit().getFaction() == other.getFaction()

      • advanceTime

        @Model
void advanceTime(double dt)
        Updates the attack activity in function of the given time step.
        Specified by:
        advanceTime in class Activity
        Parameters:
        dt - The given time step.
        Postcondition:
        The attackTimer is decreased with dt.
            new.getAttackTimer() == this.getAttackTimer() - dt
        Effect:
        If the attack is completed, finish the attack activity
            if (new.getAttackTimer() <= 0)
              this.finishActivity()

      • reset

        @Raw
void reset()
        Resets the activity.
        Specified by:
        reset in class Activity
        Postcondition:
        The attackTimer will be reset.
            this.getAttackTimer() == 0
        Effect:
        The tracker is interrupted.
            this.interruptTracker()
